reviewText: Bought for my Mom. She was a Mopar muscle nut. Her Father was a Mopar dealer from early 40s thru mid 70s so my family has a special connection to these cars.
QUALITY DVD. WILL BE ENJOYED BY ALL WHO VIEW IT.
since I enjoy old cars-watching this dvd was the best-I will purchase other dvd's in the near future-Thanks

The Dart was a damn good car.  It really was.  It was a beautiful streamlined Chrylser that was light and lithe; it had a slant 6 engine and had a good track record on the road.

This film treats readers to the history of some really cool Chryslers like the Dart and its sister, the Plymouth Valiant and cousin, the Plymouth Roadrunner.  Viewers will no doubt see just what a damn good car that Dart really was!
